command.name: create
command.argGroup:
<help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.ipTags" options="ip-tags" group="">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.zones" options="zone z" group="">

help.short: The Fully Qualified Domain Name of the A DNS record associated with the public IP. This is the concatenation of the domainNameLabel and the regionalized DNS zone.

command.name: update

help.short: The Fully Qualified Domain Name of the A DNS record associated with the public IP. This is the concatenation of the domainNameLabel and the regionalized DNS zone.
The type of the extended location.

command.argGroup:
<help short="Location. Values from: `az account list-locations`. You can configure the default location using `az configure --defaults location=`."/>
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="$parameters.properties.natGateway.properties.publicIpAddresses" options="public-ip-addresses" group="Properties">

<arg nullable="True" type="array<@SubResource_update>" var="$parameters.properties.natGateway.properties.publicIpPrefixes" options="public-ip-prefixes" group="Properties">

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.natGateway.zones" options="zones">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.zones" options="zones z" hide="True" group="Parameters">

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@PublicIPAddress_update.properties.ipTags" options="ip-tags" group="Properties">

<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="@PublicIPAddress_update.zones" options="zones">
